data: A few months had elapsed since I quitted Montpellier to follow my profession as physician in Paris, when I was sent for one morning to attend a sick Nun at a convent in the Faubourg St. Jacques.
Montpellier | Paris | Nun | Faubourg St. Jacques
Duras, Claire de Durfort, duchesse de, 1777-1828
